blocks.name: inteq
blocks.content: Equality law for intersection. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-1999.)
blocks.origin:
thm inteq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cint(c0), cint(c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cint(c0), cint(c1), cab(hs0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cab(hs0, wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  raleq(hs1, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  dfint2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  dfint2(hs0, hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inteq(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí ‚ãÇ c0 = ‚ãÇ c1)

  abbidv(hs0, c0 = c1, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà hs1))
  raleq(hs1, c0, c1, hs0 ‚àà hs1)
  dfint2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  dfint2(hs0, hs1, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

}

  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, cv(s0)))

blocks.name: intss1
blocks.content: An element of a class includes the intersection of the class. Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 44 (with correction), generalized to classes. (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm intss1(class c0, class c1) {
